casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Roy Lee McDOUGALD. No. 168P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 26, 2006. Kathleen U. Baldwin, Assistant Attorney General, Edward W. Grannis, Jr., District Attorney for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st day of March 2005 by Defendant to Proceed as Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 26th day of January 2006."
